Bases: Dataset

PyTorch dataset class for semantic segmentation using HuggingFaces SegFormer model.

dsa_helpers.ml.datasets.utils module

dsa_helpers.ml.datasets.utils.create_segformer_segmentation_dataset(df: DataFrame | str, low_memory: bool = True, transforms=None)[source]

Create a SegFormer segmentation dataset from a DataFrame.

Parameters:

  • df (pd.DataFrame | str) – A pandas DataFrame with columns “fp” and “mask_fp” or a path to a CSV file.

  • low_memory (bool) – Whether to read the CSV file in low memory mode.

  • transforms – A function that takes in a batch of samples (dictionary with pixel_values and label keys) and returns a transformed batch.

Returns:

A Dataset object to be used for HuggingFaces SegFormer model training.

dsa_helpers.ml.datasets.utils.dataset_generator(dataset)[source]

Yield a dataset.
